app.title: EduNova
app.subtitle: Educational platform with smart scheduling and real-time collaboration

calendar.selectDate: Select a date to view events
calendar.createEventDesc: Add a new event to your calendar. Click save when you're done.
calendar.error: Error loading events. Please try again.
calendar.noEvents: No events found for this date. Create your first event!

event.title: Title
event.createdDesc: Your event has been successfully created.

autoplan.title: AI-Assisted Planning
autoplan.subtitle: Let EduNova intelligently schedule your learning activities around existing commitments
autoplan.whatToLearn: What do you need to learn?
autoplan.placeholder: E.g., React Hooks, Calculus I, French Vocabulary
autoplan.prefTimeDesc: EduNova will try to schedule within this range first, but may suggest alternatives if needed.
autoplan.scheduledDesc: Your learning activity has been intelligently scheduled.
autoplan.howItWorksDesc: Intelligent scheduling that adapts to your learning style
autoplan.smartTimeDesc: EduNova analyzes your existing calendar and finds the optimal time for your learning activities, prioritizing based on your preferences and deadlines.
autoplan.focusBlocksDesc: The system automatically adds focus sessions between your scheduled events to maximize retention and help you prepare for upcoming lessons.
autoplan.rebalancingDesc: If your day becomes too packed, EduNova will intelligently move lower-priority tasks to maintain a balanced learning schedule.
autoplan.aiContextDesc: Every scheduled event includes AI-generated summaries, prerequisites, and study tips to enhance your learning experience.

learningContext.title: Learning Context
learningContext.subtitle: AI-enhanced insights for your next lesson

skillTree.title: Skill Tree
skillTree.description: Track your learning progress and unlock new skills
skillTree.empty: No skills available for this course yet
